tool_description: Gathers comprehensive real estate market statistics for a specified geographic area and time period, including median prices, inventory levels, and market trends.

zip_code.description: Target ZIP code for market analysis

start_date.description: Start date for market data collection (ISO 8601)

end_date.description: End date for market data collection (ISO 8601)

property_types.description: Property types to include in analysis

include_pending_sales.description: Whether to include pending sales in market data

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provided ZIP code format is incorrect or does not exist. Use 5-digit US ZIP code format.
Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date, and both must be valid ISO 8601 formatted dates.
Insufficient market data: Not enough sales data available for the specified area and time period. Try expanding the date range.
Unsupported property type: One or more property types in the array are not recognized. Use standard types like 'single family', 'condo', 'townhouse'.
usage: Provide ZIP code and date range for market analysis. Optionally specify property types and whether to include pending sales. Returns comprehensive market statistics for the area and period.

median_sale_price.description: Median sale price for the period and area

average_sale_price.description: Average sale price for the period and area

average_days_on_market.description: Average days properties stayed on market

inventory_months.description: Months of inventory based on current sales pace

market_trend.description: Overall market trend: rising, stable, or declining
